title: VNC501CB: 5D4N Classic Da Nang - Hue - Ba Na Hills - Hoi An Discovery
subtitle: Explore the cultural heart of Central Vietnam
description: A perfect journey through Vietnam's imperial history and coastal beauty
overview: Discover the rich cultural heritage of Central Vietnam with this comprehensive 5-day tour covering the ancient capital of Hue, the vibrant city of Da Nang, the magical Ba Na Hills, and the charming ancient town of Hoi An.
highlights: Golden Bridge experience, Imperial City tour, Hoi An Ancient Town walking tour, Dragon Bridge fire show

itinerary.title: Da Nang Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrival in Da Nang - Transfer to hotel - Ba Na Hills full day tour with Golden Bridge and French Village

itinerary.title: Hue Imperial City
itinerary.description: Da Nang to Hue via Hai Van Pass - Imperial City tour - Thien Mu Pagoda - Perfume River cruise

itinerary.title: Hoi An Ancient Town
itinerary.description: Hue to Hoi An - My Son Sanctuary - Hoi An Ancient Town walking tour - Japanese Covered Bridge

itinerary.title: Hoi An Culture & Cooking
itinerary.description: Tra Que Vegetable Village - Cooking class - Basket boat tour - Hoi An night market

itinerary.title: Da Nang Departure
itinerary.description: Free time for shopping - My Khe Beach - Dragon Bridge - Transfer to airport - Departure

hotels: Da Nang: 3 Star - Sepon Blue Hotel 3* / Pandora Danang Hotel or similar, 4 Star - Luxtery Da Nang 4* / Nhu Minh Danang 4* or similar, 5 Star - Golden Bay Danang Hotel 5* / Muong Thanh Luxury Danang 5* or similar | Hoi An: 4 Star - Historic Hoian, Silkotel Hoian, La Charm Hoi An Hotel & Spa or similar | Hue: 4 Star - Thanh Lich Hotel Hue, Romance Hotel or similar

seo.metaDescription: Discover Central Vietnam's UNESCO World Heritage Sites with our 5-day Da Nang-Hue-Hoi An tour. Visit Ba Na Hills Golden Bridge, Imperial City, and Hoi An Ancient Town.
